thread.title: Stocks to Watch: 21st Century Fox, Comcast, Target, Walmart, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Lowe’s, Tiffany - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Amrith Ramkumar
title: Stocks to Watch: 21st Century Fox, Comcast, Target, Walmart, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Lowe’s, Tiffany - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Wednesday’s session. —Up 0.9%: Cable giant said it is “in advanced stages of preparing” a higher, all-cash offer for the entertainment assets that 21st Century Fox has agreed to sell to Walt Disney Co. for $52.4 billion in stock. Comcast shares were down 1.6%, while Fed Minutes Might Not Stop the Bond Selloff Next Brexit & Beyond: Europe Trails America Like Never Before
